pros: Support that's not harsh; Impact-absorbing; Gives your stride a boost; Very comfy for recovery runs; Stable when cornering; Breathable; Keeps the foot in place; Grip that sticks

RR_verdict: We appreciate the Wave Horizon 6 from Mizuno for being a stability running shoe that's ready for cruising long miles and giving our feet and legs the rest day they deserve during recovery sessions. Unlike other stability shoes, the Horizon 6 doesn't feel harsh. As a matter of fact, it's a very comfy shoe that will give you all the cushioning you crave.
awards: Top 29% in road running shoes, Top 24% in stability running shoes
